competencies.name: Operative selects and wears the correct personal protective equipment (PPE) for baling waste
Operative reports defective PPE and requests replacement(s)
competencies.supportingText:
Operative reports defective personal protective equipment (PPE) and requests replacement(s)
  1. When would you report your PPE as not being fit for purpose?
  2. Who and how would you report this?

competencies.name: Operative follows site rules when moving around the site
Operative conducts the appropriate pre-use baling equipment checks
Operative ensures baling equipment is safe to start (no blockages or maintenance work being conducted)
Operative follows company procedures when operating baling equipment
Operative ensures other persons keep at a safe distance
Operative reports any equipment defects
competencies.supportingText:
Operative reports any equipment defects
  1. What is the company procedure for reporting equipment defects?

competencies.name: Operative stacks baled wastes safely and in accordance with company procedures
Operative reports any contamination in waste to be baled
competencies.supportingText:
Operative reports contamination in waste to be baled
  1. What action would you take if you identified non-conforming materials about to be baled?

competencies.name: Operative demonstrates safe shut down procedure in response to a potential/actual blockage
Operative clears and reports blockage(s) in accordance with company procedures
competencies.supportingText:
Operative clears and reports blockages in accordance with company procedures
  1. What steps should you undertake if the baler is blocked?
  2. Why is it important to follow the correct process when the baler is blocked?

competencies.name: Operative contributes to reports detailing baled waste
Operative completes pre-use baling equipment paperwork
Operative completes any incident reporting documentation
competencies.supportingText:
Operative completes any incident reporting documentation
  1. Why is it important to complete this documentation?
